title: John Smith on the Virginia colony - purpose

content.question: Smith most likely wrote his account for which of the following reasons?

choices.label: To recruit missionaries to come to the Virginia colony
To increase support for the colony from the monarchy and investors
To promote an alliance between colonists in Virginia and colonists elsewhere in the Americas
To encourage the Virginia colonists to abandon the colony

content.answer: To increase support for the colony from the monarchy and investors

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
